GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
scsi: efct: Fix possible memleak in efct_device_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit 038359eeccffaf0de4c1c9c51ee19cc5649619a1, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 4df84e8466242de835416a4ec0c856c0e2ed26eb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: efct: Fix possible memleak in efct_device_init()
OSV.details:
